title: Equality of civil liberties across social groups index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent to which social groups — defined by language, ethnicity, religion, race, region, and/or caste — are free from forced labor, have property rights and access to the justice system, and enjoy freedoms of movement. Higher scores mean more equality.
